inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [04253800]
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2005; sold in April for RKOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [F Buhot pinx sc]; bottm center, in the print: [Le Fete Nationale du 30 Juin / au Boulevard Clichy]; LLC below street light, in the print: [Felix Buhot / (illegible) Julliet - 1878 Boulevard Clichy]
title: National Holiday, Boulevard de Clichy
